channel.title: Check Out My Projects on Quakkels.com
channel.description: Recent content in Check Out My Projects on Quakkels.com

item.title: Pointing-online
item.description: Pointing-online is a .Net Core project written in C# that was inspired by real world needs of distributed teams practicing Agile Scrum.

item.title: Roast.it
item.description: Roast.it is a simple JavaScript unit testing library designed for providing a fast feedback loop with minimal fuss. There are no frills here. No unnecessary dependencies. This will run unit tests for you from npm test. It will not get in your way.
